official_title: A Phase 3 Multicenter, Randomized, Open Label, Active-controlled, Study of AMG 510 Versus Docetaxel for the Treatment of Previously Treated Locally Advanced and Unresectable or Metastatic NSCLC Subjects With Mutated KRAS p.G12C
inclusion_criteria:
* Men or women greater than or equal to 18 years old.
* ECOG â‰¤ 1
* Pathologically documented, previously treated, locally-advanced and unresectable or metastatic NSCLC with KRAS p.G12C mutation confirmed through central testing or have documentation of KRAS p.G12C mutation through Amgen Study 20190294 prior to enrollment
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Active brain metastases
* Myocardial infarction within 6 months of study day 1
* Gastrointestinal (GI) tract disease causing the inability to take oral medication
